definition: to care about/equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
not to care
not in the least concerned (idiom)/reckless/couldn't give a damn about it/unperturbed/couldn't care less/harum scarum
really does not care

sentences.english: Blair: Well, lucky for you, your friend is someone I actually care about.
sentences.chinese: 算你走运，你的那位朋友碰巧是我挺在乎的一个人。

sentences.english: Why would anyone care about them outside of this domain?
sentences.chinese: 在这个领域之外还有什么人会在乎它呢？

sentences.english: That says one person is taking care only of herself or himself.
sentences.chinese: 这表示一个人只在乎他或她自己。

sentences.english: He little recked what might happen.
sentences.chinese: 他不在乎会发生什么事。

sentences.english: If you do not care about your love machine , used vegetable oil , such as points, I will not object.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不在乎你的爱机，用点菜油之类的我也不反对。
更糟糕的是没有人在乎。

sentences.english: He thinks nothing of throwing away a thousand dollars at the gambling house.
sentences.chinese: 他在赌场里一掷千金满不在乎。

sentences.english: For the kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.
sentences.chinese: 因为神的国不在乎言语，乃在乎权能。

sentences.english: For the kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.
sentences.chinese: 因为神的国不在乎言语，乃在乎权能。

sentences.english: Best of the sport is to do the deed, or shout nothing.
sentences.chinese: 体育运动的好处是只在乎行动而否则说空话。

sentences.english: And even if they withdraw from its platform, Apple seems not to care.
sentences.chinese: 即使他们撤离苹果这个平台，苹果也似乎毫不在乎。

sentences.english: I really didn't care whether they agreed or disagreed with the article's conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 我真的不在乎他们究竟是否同意这篇文章的结论。

sentences.english: The horse is made ready for the day of battle, but victory rests with the Lord .
sentences.chinese: 马是为打仗之日预备的，得胜乃在乎耶和华。

sentences.english: Who says guys are just unfeeling louts who care only about themselves?
sentences.chinese: 谁说那些只在乎他们自己的人是不会觉得自己很笨的？

sentences.english: I don't care how big. I just want a buck.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎它有多大，我只是想要一只雄鹿。

definition: to care about/to mind
not to care
to pay no attention to/not to mind
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
to care about/to take offense/to mind
to care about/to take seriously/to take to heart
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
to regard as important/to care about
to be concerned about/to care about
to take into consideration/to attend to
indifferent/insignificant
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
unworthy
stingy/mean/miserly
carefully/meticulously/to set one's heart on sth
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
